chatbot.title: Help
chatbot.intro: Hi, this is Alkemio’s automated guidance chat. It can provide you with answers based on Alkemio’s documentation. What are you looking for?

infoDialog.title: Assistance d'Alkemio
infoDialog.content:
Use the Alkemio guidance chat to get answers to your questions about the platform. This __AI-powered personal assistant__ allows you to interact with content from the Alkemio Help Center. It will also provide the sources of the answers.

Want to know more? Click [here](https://alkem.io/vc/guidance) to visit its profile!

feedback.tooltip: This message has been automatically generated based on Alkemio’s documentation. Your feedback is highly relevant to us!

confirmNewChat.title: Start a new chat?
confirmNewChat.description: Starting a new chat will clear your current chat history. Are you sure you want to proceed?

references.title: Nouveau utilisateur? Visitez nos pages de démarrage!
Still have questions? Read more here

releaseNotes.title: <small><icon/>Our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy> have been updated. Click on the titles to review them, or dismiss this notification.</small>

cookie.consent: En cliquant sur "Accepter tous les Cookies", vous acceptez le stockage de cookies sur votre appareil pour améliorer la navigation sur le site, analyser l'utilisation du site et aider dans nos efforts marketing.
cookie.settings: Lorsque vous visitez un site Web, des renseignements peuvent être conservés dans votre navigateur sous la forme de cookies. Ces informations peuvent concerner vous, vos préférences et votre appareil. Ces informations sont principalement utilisées pour rendre le site aussi bon que possible et certains sites les utilisent à des fins de marketing. Comme Alkemio n'autorise aucune publicité sur son site web, nous ne distinguons que deux types de cookies.
cookie.technical: Les cookies techniquement nécessaires : vous permettent de naviguer et d'utiliser les fonctions de base et de stocker vos préférences.
cookie.analysis: Les cookies d'analyse : nous permettent de déterminer comment les visiteurs interagissent avec nos services afin d'améliorer l'expérience utilisateur.

application-form.title: Formulaire d'application
application-form.subtitle:
Cette section vous permet de modifier les questions pour les utilisateurs qui postulent à l'espace.
Veuillez noter que ces questions ne seront affichées que lorsque les options d'adhésion (dans le bloc ci-dessus) sont réglées sur "Applications requises"
application-form.move-up: Déplacer la question vers le haut
application-form.move-down: Déplacer la question d'une position vers le bas
application-form.updated-successfully: Formulaire de candidature mis à jour avec succès.

communityGuidelines.communityGuidelinesRedirect: Click here to update the Community Guidelines in the Space settings.

confirmationDialog.title: Updating Community Guidelines
confirmationDialog.description: Are you sure you want to replace your existing Community Guidelines? This action cannot be undone.

community.applicationsHelp: Ici vous pouvez trouver tous ceux qui ont postulé pour devenir membre de cet espace. En cliquant sur eux, vous pouvez examiner leur candidature et les accepter ou les rejeter.

users.description: Search for people below or directly add their email address
users.note: Keep in mind that your personal email address will be visible to anyone you message.
users.defaultWelcomeMessage: Hi, I would like to invite you to {{spaceName}}. Have a look at the Space or click on the button below to directly accept or decline the invitation.
users.success: Your invitation was successfully sent to the following recipients:
users.failure: We couldn’t send the invitation to the following recipients:
users.invitationByEmailTooltip: {{email}} will be invited to sign up to Alkemio and to this Space

memberSettings.title: Paramètres du filtre
memberSettings.lead: Ce membre est un lead: Les référents sont affichés comme les hôtes de la communauté.
memberSettings.admin: Ce membre est un admin: (s)he a le droit d'administrer cet Espace et tout son contenu et ses contributeurs.
memberSettings.maxLeadsWarning: Notez qu'il existe un nombre maximum de référents spécifique pour les communautés. Si le nombre maximal est atteint, cette option sera désactivée pour les autres.

removeMember.remove: Cliquez ici pour supprimer cet utilisateur de cet espace. Attention, cette action ne peut être annulée.
removeMember.dialogTitle: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce membre ?
removeMember.dialogContent: By clicking CONFIRM, {{member}} will be removed from this Space and all the underlying Challenges and Opportunities {{memberFirstName}} may be member of. {{memberFirstName}}’s contributions will remain in place.

removeGuidelinesConfirmationDialog.title: Remove Community Guidelines Content

unableToAddMemberInfo.title: Unable To Add Member

accessForbidden.title: Content not available
accessForbidden.description: We apologize, but the content you requested is not available. It may have been deleted, or you may not have the permission to access it, such as if it was put in draft mode.

shareSettings.disabled: Based on the settings of the Space that this Whiteboard is in, real-time collaboration is not enabled. This means that only one user can edit at a time.

dashboardNavigation.help: Cet espace contient les défis suivants. Quand ces défis ont des opportunités, ils sont également visibles.
dashboardNavigation.privateSubspace: This is a private Subspace. Visit the Subspace and apply to become a member to view it's content.

stateEditor.invalidChars: A phase name cannot contain special characters.
stateEditor.noRepeatedStates: A phase with the same name already exists.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Phase?
deleteDialog.activeStateWarning: This phase is currently the active one and cannot be deleted. You can always rename it or select another one as the active.

confirmationDialog.title: Be careful when changing the flow!
confirmationDialog.description:
- By changing the Innovation Flow, **all changes made to the current flow will be lost**.
- All existing collaboration tools will be grouped under the first phase of the new flow.

importCalloutsDialog.title: Apply New Template
importCalloutsDialog.description:
You are about to apply a new template. This action will permanently delete your current Innovation Flow. However, the existing collaboration tools linked to different phases will remain and be grouped under the first phase of the new setup.

Please choose one of the following options:
importCalloutsDialog.yesDescription: This will include the new collaboration tools from the template in addition to your existing ones.
importCalloutsDialog.noDescription: This will replace only the Innovation Flow, keeping your current collaboration tools as they are.

info-step.title: Détails
info-step.type-comments-help: Sélectionnez « Commentaires» lorsque vous voulez que les gens répondent dans un format texte simple, comme un babillard.
info-step.type-posts-help: Sélectionnez « Cartes» lorsque vous voulez que les gens répondent dans un format de carte.
info-step.type-whiteboards-help: Sélectionnez 'Tableau blanc' lorsque vous voulez que les gens répondent sur un tableau blanc, ce qui leur permet de dessiner et d'utiliser du texte.

template-step.no-post-template-selected: Veuillez sélectionner un modèle de carte
template-step.no-whiteboard-template-selected: Veuillez sélectionner un modèle de tableau blanc

type-step.type-help-text-short: Veuillez choisir le libellé de la carte qui correspond le mieux au contexte que vous souhaitez partager.

info-step.title: Détails
info-step.tags-help-text: Ajoutez des balises de forme libre pour transmettre rapidement les informations clés sur la carte. De bonnes balises aident également à rendre la carte plus facile à trouver dans les recherches.

create-step.title: Créer
create-step.name: Nom
create-step.explanation: En complétant cette étape, la carte sera créée et vous aurez la possibilité d'ajouter des visuels.

visuals-step.title: Illustrations
visuals-step.headline: Félicitations, vous avez créé une carte avec succès !
visuals-step.explanation: Pour personnaliser davantage votre carte, pensez à ajouter des éléments visuels tels qu'une bannière à la carte.
visuals-step.bottom-note: Vous aurez toujours la possibilité de modifier ces visuels sous l'onglet paramètres ainsi que d'ajouter des pièces jointes et une bannière pour la carte Dashboard.

visual-upload.error: Error occurred while uploading the image

credential-share-request-dialog.title: Partagez vos identifiants vérifiés
credential-share-request-dialog.content: Veuillez sélectionner les identifiants que vous souhaitez stocker sur votre portefeuille hébergé Alkemio.

alkemio-user-credential-offer-dialog.title: Utilisateur Alkemio
alkemio-user-credential-offer-dialog.content: Cet identifiant permet au titulaire de prouver qu'il est un utilisateur vérifié d'Alkemio.

alkemio-community-member-credential-offe.title: Membre de la Communauté Alkemio
alkemio-community-member-credential-offe.content: Ce certificat permet au détenteur de prouver qu'il est membre de la communauté spécifiée à Alkemio.

dialog-apply-parent.title: Apply to {{parentCommunityName}}
dialog-apply-parent.body: Pour rejoindre le hub '{{challengeName}}' vous devez d'abord rejoindre '{{spaceName}}' . Veuillez ajouter le défi que vous souhaitez rejoindre dans le formulaire de demande du hub.

dialog-parent-app-pending.title: Demande de tutorat en cours!
dialog-parent-app-pending.body: To join {{challengeName}}' you must join '{{spaceName}}' Space first. There is already an application pending for that '{{spaceName}}', so you can also submit a parallel application for '{{challengeName}}'.

apply.body: Thanks for applying to our community!

dialog-join-parent.title: Join {{parentCommunityName}}
dialog-join-parent.body: Vous pouvez joindre cette communauté sans adhésion au vu de vos identifiants, mais rejoignez d'abord {{parentCommunityName}} en acceptant ses termes et conditions pour pouvoir y accéder.

backdrop.private: Vous souhaitez en lire plus? Veuillez vous connecter ou rejoindre si vous n'êtes pas encore membre de ce {{blockName}}!
backdrop.authentication: Veuillez vous connecter pour voir les détails du {{blockName}}.

referenceSegment.title: Références
referenceSegment.description: Please keep in mind that all the files you attach here become publicly available. If you only want the members of this Space to be able to access the files, attach it to a post or a collection of links on one of the member pages.
referenceSegment.url-helper-text: Keep in mind that all uploaded files become accessible to everyone with the link and can only be deleted by the Alkemio team. <terms>Click here</terms> for the terms and conditions.
referenceSegment.plaintext-helper-text: Click here for the terms and conditions. You can upload Word, PDF, Excel, or images up to 15 MB

file-upload.file-size-error: La taille du fichier dépasse la limite de {{limit}}Mo
file-upload.file-upload-success: Le fichier a été téléchargé avec succès

deleteEntity.title: Danger Zone
deleteEntity.description: Click here to delete this {{entity}}. Be careful, this action cannot be undone.

confirmDialog.title: Confirm {{entity}} Deletion
confirmDialog.description: Are you certain you want to delete this {{entity}}? Keep in mind that this action is irreversible. You can only delete a {{entity}} if there are no underlying Subspaces associated with it. If there are any Subspaces within this page, please delete them first (you can do so from the {{entity}} settings > Subspaces page).
confirmDialog.descriptionShort: Are you certain you want to delete this {{entity}}? Keep in mind that this action is irreversible.
confirmDialog.checkbox: Please check this box if you are certain about deleting this {{entity}}

description.title: Commenter une discussion
description.placeholder: Ajouter plus d'informations sur la discussion ici

tooltip.markdown-help:
Vous pouvez ajouter le formatage à votre commentaire,
par exemple :
Texte Gras : **gras**
Texte italique : *italique*
En-tête : ##Title
Lien : [text](url)
tooltip.mentions: Tapez quelques caractères pour trouver les utilisateurs concernés

vcInteractions.disclaimer: Create a new comment to interact with another VC.
vcInteractions.help: You can only interact with one Virtual Contributor per thread (comment + 'sub’comments). If you’d like to engage with another VC, start a new thread by creating a comment in the bottom input field.

description.title: Further information
description.placeholder: Add further information on the discussion here

discussions.no-data-create: Aucune discussion. Créer une nouvelle discussion
discussions.no-data-join: Aucune discussion. Veuillez rejoindre la communauté pour créer une discussion

COLLABORATION_CALLOUT_PUBLISHED.subject: {{spaceName}} - New {{calloutType}} is published "{{calloutName}}", have a look!
COLLABORATION_CALLOUT_PUBLISHED.description: {{contributorName}} published a new {{calloutType}} in {{spaceLevel}}: {{spaceName}}, with name: {{calloutName}}.

COMMUNICATION_USER_MENTION.subject: {{commenterName}} mentioned you in a comment on {{calloutName}}:

COMMUNITY_NEW_MEMBER.subject: {{spaceName}} - Welcome to the Community!
COMMUNITY_NEW_MEMBER.description:
Thank you for joining {{spaceName}}!
You can now start contributing to the various posts and whiteboards, further deepen your knowledge about this topic, and connect with other Contributors.

COMMUNITY_NEW_MEMBER_ADMIN.subject: {{memberType}} "{{memberName}}" joined {{spaceName}}
COMMUNITY_NEW_MEMBER_ADMIN.description: The {{memberType}} {{memberName}} has joined {{spaceName}}, of which you are an admin.

spaceWelcomeDialog.title: 🎉 Your Space is Ready!
spaceWelcomeDialog.description:
Now, make it your own:
⚙ Set it up – Customize your structure and settings.
📝 Add content - Create whiteboards, posts, and more.
🤝 Invite collaborators – Find the invitations in the Space Settings.
📚 Need help? Tutorials are available in your Space if you chose to include them.

✨ Want more features? Upgrade to Plus or Premium anytime - just contact our team!

innovationHub.foreignSpace: This {{spaceDisplayName}} is not in the selection of current starting page. You are anyway very welcome to contribute. Enjoy exploring!

outsideOfSpace.forum: Ceci est le forum général d'Alkemio, en dehors de l'espace {{space}} . Vous êtes très invité à explorer et à contribuer !
outsideOfSpace.subspaces: Here you can find all Subspaces that are hosted on Alkemio, also the ones that are not selected by {{space}}. Enjoy exploring!
outsideOfSpace.contributors: Ici vous pouvez trouver tous les défis qui sont hébergés sur Alkemio, également ceux qui ne sont pas sélectionnés par {{space}}. Amusez-vous à explorer !

innovationHub.goToMainPage: Vous souhaitez collaborer dans d'autres Espaces .

dashboard.description: Ici vous pouvez voir le résumé pour ce {{entity}}. Naviguez dans les autres onglets pour voir des informations plus détaillées !

about.description: Ici, vous pouvez explorer le contexte de ce {{entity}}, ainsi que la communauté.

explore.description: Ici, vous pouvez contribuer à la compréhension du contexte. Il s'agit de surfaçer la sagesse de la communauté.

discussions.description: Ici vous pouvez lire et participer aux discussions autour de ce {{entity}}.

notifications.errorCreatingSpace: An error ocurred while creating the Space.

visibility.title: Visibilité
visibility.public: Public: This space and its contents are visible for everyone on the platform. Users can only contribute if they are a member.
visibility.private: Private: This space is visible to everyone on the platform, but the content is only visible to members. Please note that both the information in the profile and the context are publicly visible.
visibility.publicSubspace: Public: This Subspace and all its contents are visible to everyone who has access to the Space it belongs to. If the Space itself is public, this Subspace and its contents will be visible to all users, including those outside the Space.
visibility.privateSubspace: Private: This Subspace is visible to all members of the Space, but its contents are restricted and can only be accessed by members of the Subspace. No application required: All Space members can directly join, without you having to review their application.

membership.title: Appartenance
membership.open: No Application required: All Alkemio users can directly join, without you having to review their application. Others will first have to create an Alkemio account, but can then also join this Space directly.
membership.applications: Application required: If people want to become a member, they have to fill in the application form. You receive their applications (see Community tab here) and can choose to accept these or not. If you want, you can choose to leave the form empty.
membership.invitations: Invitation only: Users can only become a member after you’ve invited them (which you can do from the Community tab here) or if they are added manually. There is no Apply or Join button for others to click.
membership.hostOrganizationJoin: Host organization: Allow people who are associated with {{host}} to directly join, without having to apply or be invited.
membership.allowSubspaceAdminsToInviteMembers: Space invitations: Allow admins of Subspaces to invite users to their Subspace. Users who were not yet a member of this Space, will become so when they accept the Subspace invitation.

memberActions.title: Actions de membre
memberActions.createBlocks: Create Blocks: Allow members to create blocks for collaboration tools & posts. If you deactivate this, members will still be able to contribute to existing posts and calls, but will not be able to create new blocks.
memberActions.createSubspaces: Create Subspaces: Allow members to create Subspaces in this Space. If you deactivate this, you can still create Subspaces yourself and add other people as an admin inside the Subspace.
memberActions.eventsFromSubspaces: Subspace events: Allow events from Subspaces to be visible on this Space calendar as well.
memberActions.supportAsAdmin: Alkemio Support: Allow the Alkemio Support team to act as an admin in this Space.

copySpace.title: Copy Subspace
copySpace.description: To utilize this Subspace setup, you can either duplicate it within the same Space or save it as a template for use across the platform. In both scenarios, the innovation flow and all collaboration tools will be replicated. Please note that comments or contributions to a tool will not be included in the template or duplicated Subspace.
copySpace.createTemplateTooltip: To create a template from this Subspace, you need Space admin permissions.

exploreSpaces.title: Explore Spaces of Your Interest
exploreSpaces.subtitle: All activity on Alkemio happens inside Spaces and their corresponding Subspaces. Explore both to find topics where you can contribute!
exploreSpaces.caption:
Discover a diverse range of Spaces awaiting your exploration. Whether you're an experienced member or a curious newcomer, there's something here for everyone. Let's delve into the details:
  1. Member Spaces: These are spaces where you already hold membership.
  2. Public Spaces: These spaces have visible content, and you can request to join them.
  3. All Spaces: This category includes both public and private spaces. In private spaces, only limited content is visible, but you can still apply for membership.
exploreSpaces.noSpaceMemberships: You’re not currently a member of any Space. Click here to visit our {{welcomeSpace}}, which is a fantastic starting point for your space on Alkemio!

search.noResults: No results matched your search terms.

search.leading-placeholder: Rechercher dans le nom ou les tags

whiteboardDisconnected.title: Whiteboard connection lost
whiteboardDisconnected.message: Apologies for the inconvenience! The whiteboard isn't available for editing right now, possibly due to a network issue or loss of access. Please try closing and reopening the whiteboard or refreshing the page. If the issue persists, reach out to your Space administrator for assistance.
whiteboardDisconnected.lastSaved: The content of this whiteboard was last saved {{lastSaved}}.
whiteboardDisconnected.offline: You are currently offline. The whiteboard will try to reconnect when you are back online.

readonlyReason.readonly: View only mode click here to learn why
readonlyReason.contentUpdatePolicy: You don't have the rights to edit this whiteboard. Ask the owner, <ownerlink>{{ownerName}}</ownerlink>, to change the settings if you want to contribute.
readonlyReason.noMembership: You have to be a member of the {{spaceLevel}} this whiteboard is in, to be able to edit. Click here to <spacelink>join/apply</spacelink>
readonlyReason.unauthenticated: You have to be signed in and a member of the {{spaceLevel}} this whiteboard is in, to be able to edit. Click here to <signinlink>sign in</signinlink>

reason.inactivity: You can’t edit this Whiteboard because you were inactive for too long. Please try reopening the whiteboard to continue editing.
reason.multiUserNotAllowed: You can’t edit this Whiteboard because this Space only allows one whiteboard editor at a time
reason.roomCapacityReached: You can’t edit this Whiteboard because this Space allows for multiple editors simultaneously, but the maximum is reached
reason.generic:
You can’t edit this Whiteboard for one of the following reasons:

- You were inactive for 2 hours or more
- You are not a member of the Space
- This Space only allows one whiteboard editor at a time
- This Space allows for more editors, but the maximum is reached

login.title: Se connecter à Alkemio
login.register: Vous n'avez pas encore de compte Alkemio ? <signup>Cliquez ici pour vous inscrire.</signup>

about.title: Réinventer la collaboration
about.description: Alkemio place les Challenges au centre de chaque défi, offrant un endroit central et neutre pour la collaboration.

error.title: Ouuups!
error.line1: On dirait que quelque chose s'est mal passé : <italic>{{message}}</italic>
error.line2: Veuillez vérifier que votre serveur ({{graphQLEndpoint}}) est disponible et recharger la page.
error.line3: Si l'erreur persiste, veuillez contacter notre support.

errors.LazyLoadError: Network error occurred. Please try reloading the page.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try reloading the page.

four-ou-four.title: Something went wrong...
four-ou-four.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for either doesn't exist or has been moved, or you don't have the rights to access it. This may happen because you aren't a member of the community yet or are not signed in. Don't worry, our team is there to help!

links.faq: Have a look in our FAQ and documentation to find what you are looking for, or contact the team.

registration.header: Créez un compte et commencez à faire\ \ du bien
registration.introduction:
Bienvenue à Alkemio ! Alkemio facilite la gestion des défis et a des contributeurs, de n'importe où, travaillant ensemble sur des solutions. Les défis sont au centre de la scène.

Pour garder la plate-forme en sécurité, ouverte et constructive, chaque utilisateur doit accepter les Conditions d'utilisation et Politique de confidentialité. Veuillez lire ces documents et les accepter ci-dessous avant de continuer.
registration.introduction-short: Alkemio is designed to benefit society. Please read and accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy before you continue.
registration.terms: J'accepte les <terms>Conditions d'utilisation</terms> et la <privacy>Politique de confidentialité</privacy>.

accept-terms.introduction:
Bienvenue à Alkemio ! Alkemio facilite la gestion des défis et a des contributeurs, de n'importe où, travaillant ensemble sur des solutions. Les défis sont au centre de la scène.

Pour garder la plate-forme en sécurité, ouverte et constructive, chaque utilisateur doit accepter les Conditions d'utilisation et Politique de confidentialité. Veuillez lire ces documents et les accepter ci-dessous avant de continuer.
accept-terms.tooltip: Veuillez lire et accepter les conditions d'utilisation et la politique de confidentialité avant de continuer

registrationSuccess.message:
The last step is to verify your email address. Please check your inbox for an email with instructions.

If you have not received an email, click here to send it again.
registrationSuccess.continue: …or continue to the platform without signing in

verification-success.header: Merci d'avoir vérifié votre adresse e-mail !
verification-success.subheader: Votre profil est maintenant entièrement activé sur la plateforme. Profitez-en !
verification-success.message: S'il vous plaît envisagez de remplir tous les messages de votre profil Il aide à la fois à postuler pour rejoindre les communautés et à communiquer avec vous.

message.initial: Entrez votre adresse mail ci-dessous. Vous recevrez un lien pour réinitialiser votre mot de passe.

verification.message: Pour recevoir un nouvel e-mail de vérification, veuillez entrer votre adresse e-mail ci-dessous.

verification-required.header: La vérification de l'e-mail est en cours.
verification-required.message:
Vous êtes presque là... Une dernière étape est de vérifier votre e-mail.
Veuillez consulter votre boîte de réception pour obtenir des instructions.

Si vous n'avez pas reçu d'e-mail, cliquez sur ce lien pour envoyer à nouveau.

confirmation-dialog.title: Leaving Space {{space}}
confirmation-dialog.text:
Are you sure you want to leave {{space}}?

You will no longer receive updates or have access to shared resources from this Space or its Subspaces. If this Space is public, you an rejoin at any time, or if private, you will need an invitation to rejoin.

Note that if you're a member of a Subspace inside this Space, you will also be automatically removed from there.

confirmation-dialog.title: Leaving Subspace {{space}}
confirmation-dialog.text:
Are you sure you want to leave {{space}}?

You will no longer receive updates or have access to shared resources from this Subspace or its Subspaces. If this Subspace is public, you an rejoin at any time, or if private, you will need an invitation to rejoin.

Note that if you're a member of a Subspace inside this Subspace, you will also be automatically removed from there.

communities.title: Groupes
communities.noMembership: Not a member of any Space or SubSpace yet.

pending-applications.title: Demandes en attente
pending-applications.help: Applications en attente pour cet utilisateur

verifiable-credentials.title: Identifiants vérifiables
verifiable-credentials.help: Identifiants que l'utilisateur détient délivrés par des groupes de confiance

knowledge.title: Knowledge
knowledge.description: Answers {{name}} gives are based on the body of knowledge coming from:

personality.title: Basic Prompts & Engine
personality.description: To allow people to interact with the body of knowledge described above, Alkemio uses an engine and a basic set of instructions. These instructions make sure that the Virtual Contributor for example only answers questions using the specified body of knowledge so you can trust the answers it is giving.

context.title: Context
context.description: {{name}} uses the following information from the Space it is invited to so it can provide you with meaningful answers:

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: For Alkemio, safeguarding your data is of utmost importance. We are committed to maintaining the security and privacy of your information.
privacy.bullets:
• When interacting with a Virtual Contributor, only the data explicitly specified on the left (Context) is used to generate meaningful answers.
  • Importantly, your (Space) data is not utilized for training the Virtual Contributor.
  • Additionally, please note that questions and answers exchanged with the Virtual Contributor may be visible to the Alkemio team.

personality.description: This Virtual Contributor operates using the following external AI service: Mistral. All questions submitted to this Virtual Contributor, along with any related comments in a threaded conversation, will be sent to Mistral. Please be aware that this data may be used to train and improve their model.

privacy.description: At Alkemio, protecting your data is our top priority. We are fully committed to ensuring the security and privacy of your information. Here’s how we handle your data when interacting with a Virtual Contributor (VC):
privacy.bullets:
• Only the content of your question and any related comments in a threaded conversation are shared with the AI service that powers the Virtual Contributor.
  • Please be aware that if the Virtual Contributor is based on an external AI service, such as Mistral, the data shared may be used to further train and improve that service.
  • Additionally, note that questions and answers exchanged with the Virtual Contributor may be accessible to the Alkemio team for monitoring or support purposes.

membership.title: Virtual Contributor Memberships
membership.noMemberships: This Virtual Contributor is not a member of any space

visibility.public: Public: This Virtual Contributor can be invited to all Spaces on Alkemio
visibility.private: Private: This Virtual Contributor can be invited to spaces within my account.
visibility.hidden: Hidden: This Virtual Contributor cannot be invited.

ingestion.title: Update Knowledge
ingestion.infoText: By clicking the button below, you will make sure your Virtual Contributor is based on the latest knowledge in the Subspace.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.infoText: Available variables: [{{availableVariables}}] . Do not include any alternative text between { } in the prompt, as this will disrupt the functionality of this Virtual Contributor.

externalConfig.title: External Configuration
externalConfig.infoText: The Virtual Contributor is powered by an external AI service. Please provide the following information to connect to the service.
externalConfig.apiKeyPlaceholder: Current key signature is '{{value}}'. By changing this value current key will be overriden and can not be recovered.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.tooltip1: Public: When users visit {{vcName}}'s profile, they can see the content of its body of knowledge.
privacy.tooltip2: Private: Only the account admins can see the content of the body of knowledge.

noAccess.title: Private Virtual Contributor Knowledge
noAccess.description: You don't have access to the knowledge base of this Virtual Contributor. Please contact the owner of the Virtual Contributor for more information.

your-credentials.title: Identifiants vérifiables
your-credentials.description: Alkemio met en cache vos identifiants vérifiables dans votre portefeuille hébergé dans le cloud. Les identifiants que vous partagez vous accorderont des privilèges dans les communautés de la plateforme.

forum.title: Forum
forum.subtitle: Cette section vous permet de sélectionner vos préférences concernant la réception de messages

help-dialog.title: Vous cherchez de l'aide?
help-dialog.text:
Nous voulons vous aider à utiliser la plate-forme Alkemio, et pour ce faire, nous voulons rendre le processus d'utilisation et d'interaction plus facile. Voici comment vous pouvez avoir un impact sur les sujets qui vous intéressent.

Cliquez sur les icônes ci-dessous pour trouver des réponses à vos questions, contactez l'équipe d'Alkemio pour obtenir de l'aide ou commencez !
help-dialog.tips-and-tricks: Vous recherchez des trucs et astuces ? Retrouvez les dans les articles de blog ici!

forum.title: Des questions, des suggestions ou des commentaires? Contactez l'équipe d'Alkemio ou d'autres utilisateurs de la plateforme!
forum.subtitle: Get in touch with the Alkemio team or other users of the platform!

session.default: Impossible d'obtenir les informations de la session !

messages.successfully-recovered-password: Veuillez saisir un nouveau mot de passe dans les 15 prochaines minutes pour terminer la réinitialisation de votre mot de passe.
messages.request-recover-password:
An email containing a recovery code has been sent to the email address you provided.

If you have not received an email, please check the following:

  • Check the spelling of the email address.
  • Ensure you are using the email address you registered with.
  • Check your spam or junk folder in case the email was filtered.
  • If you registered using LinkedIn, Microsoft, or another social login, password recovery via email will not work. Please use the respective social login option instead.


    • Note: This does not confirm that an account is registered with this email.
messages.verification-flow-expired: Le lien de vérification a expiré. Veuillez en demander un nouveau en soumettant à nouveau votre e-mail.
messages.recovery-flow-expired: Ce lien de réinitialisation de mot de passe a expiré. Veuillez en demander un nouveau en envoyant à nouveau votre e-mail.
messages.login-flow-account-exists: Vous essayez de vous connecter avec un compte LinkedIn/Microsoft, mais l'adresse e-mail associée était déjà utilisée auparavant. Veuillez vous connecter avec cette adresse e-mail et ce mot de passe ou essayer de réinitialiser le mot de passe. Si cela ne fonctionne pas, veuillez envoyer un e-mail à support@alkem.io.
messages.invalid-credentials: The email address or password you inserted is invalid. Please check your credentials and try again. Are you trying to sign up instead? You can do so by clicking the link above.
messages.pick-password: Pick a password for your account

errors.generic-with-code: Une erreur est survenue avec le code {{code}}

dashboard-updates-section.dialog-title: Mises à jour depuis les référents

dashboard-discussions-section.title: Discussions - {{count}})
dashboard-discussions-section.no-data-create: Aucune discussion disponible. Créer une nouvelle discussion
dashboard-discussions-section.no-data-join: Aucune discussion disponible. Veuillez rejoindre la communauté pour créer une discussion

postLocation.title: Emplacement de la publication
postLocation.label: Contribuer à Callout
postLocation.reminder: Soyez prudent en changeant l'emplacement des messages. Déplacer le message vers un autre rappel le fera disparaître du rappel actuel. Cela pourrait rendre difficile pour les gens, y compris la personne qui a créé ce poste, de le récupérer. Notez que vous ne pouvez déplacer des postes que dans le même espace, défi ou opportunité.
postLocation.success: Carte transférée avec succès vers le nouvel Callout.
postLocation.error: Quelque chose s'est mal passé lors du déplacement de la carte, veuillez réessayer.

delete.title: Voulez-vous vraiment supprimer cette annonce ?
delete.description: Cette action ne peut pas être annulée

closeConfirm.title: Discard Callout
closeConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to close this Callout? Unsaved changes will be lost.

associates-view.sign-in: Veuillez vous connecter pour voir les utilisateurs qui sont associés à cette organisation.

whiteboard.text: Bannière de carte affichant un aperçu du tableau blanc de {{displayName}}

terms.checkboxLabel: I have read and accept the <terms>terms and agreements (click here to open them)</terms> for creating a Space.
terms.dialogTitle: Terms and Conditions for creating a Space
terms.dialogContent: I understand that as a host, I am responsible for all content within the Space.
terms.fullTermsLink: Click here to read more about the Terms & Conditions.

plansTable.title: Choose a plan
plansTable.subtitle: To create a safe environment to train your Virtual Contributor, you first need to create a Space. Choose a plan for this Space below.
plansTable.seeMore: Click here for the full description of each plan

plans.name: SPACE_LICENSE_FREE
plans.disclaimer: Free Spaces are limited to 1 Space per user
plans.disabledDisclaimer: Each user can have 1 free space. It seems like you’ve already used yours!

freeTrial.title: Free trial
freeTrial.content:
Try our free 30-day trial of the Plus license to unlock exciting features like creating Virtual Contributors and multi-user whiteboard editing. No payment details required! After the trial, choose between upgrading to Plus or continuing with the Free license.

Questions? [Contact our support team anytime](https://welcome.alkem.io/contact).

getStarted.title: Get started right away!
getStarted.content: Since we don’t want to hold you up any longer, you receive a 30-day free trial. After these 30 days we will ask you to set up your account details in order to continue using your Space. If you have any questions, feel free to contact support here.

virtualContributorSpaceSettings.name: Name
virtualContributorSpaceSettings.placeholder: Here you'll find a collection of documents and texts that are ingested to give this VC its insights and functionality.
virtualContributorSpaceSettings.infoTextBoK: Select the Subspace you want as a body of knowledge for this Virtual Contributor
virtualContributorSpaceSettings.noSubspacesInfo: Create a Subspace first, and populate it with the relevant information for your Virtual Contributor.

confirmDeletion.description: Do you want to delete this {{entity}}? This action is irreversible. All profile information will be removed and people will no longer be able to interact with the {{entity}}

createVirtualContributorWizard.noSpaces: Couldn't find any Space hosted by you, please contact us for support.

autoCreated.subSpaceTagline: A Knowledge Base of a Virtual Contributor

initial.title: Create a Virtual Contributor
initial.profileDescription: Choose a name and avatar now, or personalize your profile later on the VC Profile page.
initial.description: A Virtual Contributor allows you to interact with AI on Alkemio. What do you want to make available through your Virtual Contributor?
initial.useExistingSpace: The content of a (Sub)Space on Alkemio

loadingInfo.vcSpaceCreation: A Space for interaction with your Virtual Contributor is being built. This process may take a few moments to complete.

cancel.title: Discard Virtual Contributor
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to stop creating your Virtual Contributor? Your work will not be saved. A space/subspace might already be created for you. Please, reload the page if you confirm the cancellation.

addContent.title: Add knowledge
addContent.description: What knowledge do you want your Virtual Contributor to have? Write it down in post(s).
addContent.descriptionBold: You can update, add, and remove content later.

post.title: Post title
post.exampleDescription: Tip: Create a structured and specific text, for example: Background Alkemio, founded in 2020, was born out of frustration with slow progress on COVID-related challenges and a recognition of the numerous fast-moving challenges we face daily. Governance To maintain trust and realize our long-term vision, we’ve adopted Steward Ownership as our core group structure. Steward ownership is...
post.tooltip: More posts can be added in the Body of Knowledge once the VC is created

documents.tooltip: Supported file formats: Text on websites, .pdf, .doc(x), .xls(x). Maximum file size: 20mb

addContent.submitDisabled: Add at least one Post to continue

create.title: Create Virtual Contributor with an External AI
create.subTitle: Choose a provider and enter your API Key or token to connect your external AI to a Virtual Contributor

provider.title: Provider
provider.placeholder: Select a provider from this list

comingSoon.title: 🚀 Coming soon!
comingSoon.subTitle: We're currently building the functionality to use external AI services for your Virtual Contributor. You can help us by sharing which AI service you would like to use.

input.label: AI Service
input.placeholder: E.g. the AI that xx created to xx

contactOptions.title: May we contact you if we have questions about the way you want to use this AI service?

trySection.title: 🎉 Try it out!
trySection.subTitle:
Your Virtual Contributor is successfully created and we added it to your Personal Space .
You can interact with it by typing @{{vcName}} in a comment on any post in your Space. Give it a try in the preview below!
trySection.postDescription:
At Alkemio, we utilize Posts to facilitate collaborative interactions with AI. Unlike private chats, other members within a Space can learn from and contribute to these interactions.

Similar to mentioning a human contributor, you can use the "@" symbol followed by the Virtual Contributor's name.

tryInfoSection.title: 👍That’s it!
tryInfoSection.description:
Your Virtual Contributor is ready! To start interacting, invite the Virtual Contributor to a space and once it’s a member, simply type @{{vcName}} in a comment.

Enjoy!

existingSpace.title: Choose a (Sub)Space
existingSpace.description: Which Space or Subspace do you want to bring to life with the Virtual Contributor? Below you'll be able to choose from all Spaces and Subspaces that you are host of.
existingSpace.label: (Sub)Space
existingSpace.noSpaces: You need to be an admin of a Space to proceed with this option. To create a Virtual Contributor without a Space, please go back and follow the Written Knowledge flow.

chooseCommunity.title: Hello, {{vcName}}!
chooseCommunity.description: Your Virtual Contributor is ready! To start interacting, your Virtual Contributor should be added to a Space. Select one below, or continue without. In that case you will have to add the VC manually through the Community tab of a Space.
chooseCommunity.label: Space
chooseCommunity.createAndAddToCommunity: Create, add, and go to Space

confirm.title: Continue without Space membership
confirm.description: A Virtual Contributor can only interact within a Space. Are you sure you want to proceed without adding them to a Space? You can still invite the Virtual Contributor later through the Space’s Community tab.

aboutDialog.applyNotSignedInHelperText: You’ll be redirected to Sign in to Alkemio first
